name: Feral Pounce
description: Pounce on an enemy with primal fury, dealing 1742 Bleed Damage.   Activating the ability again within the next 5 seconds causes you to cast Feral Carnage.  Feral Carnage causes the enemy to bleed for 1296 Bleed Damage over 10 seconds and deals up to 450% more damage to enemies under 100% Health.    Dealing damage with either attack restores 100 Stamina and extends your Werewolf Transformation by 1 second.
effectLines: Pounce and Carnage now restore Stamina and extend your Werewolf Transformation whenever they deal damage.
coefDescription: CRIMINAL ACT Pounce on an enemy with primal fury, dealing $1 Bleed Damage.   Activating the ability again within the next 5 seconds causes you to cast Feral Carnage.  Feral Carnage causes the enemy to bleed for $2 Bleed Damage over 10 seconds and deals up to 450% more damage to enemies under 100% Health.    Dealing damage with either attack restores 100 Stamina and extends your Werewolf Transformation by 1 second.
